page.description: Time subtraction produces a short time value or number by subtracting an integral or fractional number of Seconds from Operand1.

section.title: Examples:
section.description: The following example shows how to modify a time variable (type Y) by subtracting seconds.
The following example shows that you can subtract one time variable from another to find the elapsed time.
section.example: dim t1 as Y dim t2 as Y t1 = ctot("11:10") t2 = ctot("12:40") ? (t2 - t1)/60 = 90
